channel.title: Car on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Car on Docs

item.title: Ola Good Cat will go on sale tonight with a pre-sale price of RMB 10.50-14.50 million.
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Easy Car Newsletter It is reported that the Ola Cat will go on sale tonight (November 24), and the new car is based on Great Wall Motor’s Lemon+Coffee intelligent platform. The new car will be available in two range-extended versions, and its announced pre-sale price is RMB 105,000-145,000. The new car adopts a new design language, which is different from the simple “Q-moe” style of the Ola Black Cat and White Cat.

item.title: There was a dog's head on the driver's side of the car, and I thought it was a dog driving the car, but when I saw it, I realized it was a mistake.
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Nowadays, living conditions have become better and private cars are no longer rare, which makes it much easier for people to travel. Especially for those who have elderly people, children and pets at home, there is no need to worry about them not being able to go out because of the inconvenience of the car. However, the most important thing about driving is to pay attention to safety, as the saying goes: driving is not standardized, family members two lines of tears ah.
